org.locationtech.geowave.adapter.raster.adapter

Class SourceThresholdFixMosaicDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.media.jai.OperationDescriptorImpl
      • javax.media.jai.operator.MosaicDescriptor
        • org.locationtech.geowave.adapter.raster.adapter.SourceThresholdFixMosaicDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.media.jai.OperationDescriptor, javax.media.jai.RegistryElementDescriptor

    public class SourceThresholdFixMosaicDescriptor
extends javax.media.jai.operator.MosaicDescriptor
    this is a workaround because GeoTools resampling will force the source threshold to be 1.0 on Mosaic operations, which will mask all values under 1.0. org.geotools.coverage.processing.operation.Resample2D line 631 in gt-coverage-12.1

    This is mostly the same as MosaicDescriptor with the one key difference being that the default source threshold is Double.MIN_VALUE instead of 1.0

    See Also:
